Kapil Dev Is In Awe Of Ranveer Singh, Says He’ll Give More Than 100 Percent To Ace His Role In ‘83’
Kapil Dev Is In Awe Of Ranveer Singh, Says He’ll Give More Than 100 Percent To Ace His Role In ‘83’
Kapil is one of the greatest Indian cricketers of all times, and there is no doubt about it. When India won its first world cup, it was under the captaincy of Kapil Dev. Now, a film titled 83 based on the world cup win and a biopic on Kapil Dev is in the works and Ranveer Singh, one of the finest actors of Bollywood currently, is playing the lead.
Twitter
Not only did Ranveer Singh get the opportunity to spend time with Kapil Dev, but he also got to train with him. And now, looks like Kapil Dev is in awe of the actor. He thinks he is perfect to play his role.
Also Read: Kabir Khan Excited About Directing Kapil Dev's Biopic '83', Says It's The Best Story He's Heard In His Life

“It was not up to me to decide who will play my character in the film. But Ranveer has such great energy. I know that he will give more than 100 per cent to the film and the entire team will make this movie a success,” he was quoted as saying by IANS.
Read More: Jatin Sarna AKA Bunty From Sacred Games Bags A Role In Kapil Dev Biopic, To Play Yashpal Sharma
“Making a film like ‘83’ is a beautiful idea and I know that Ranveer and team will do a great job,” he added.
For the unversed, Kapil Dev’s daughter Amiya is working as an assistant director on the film and he is extremely happy about it. “My daughter has never seen me play cricket. However, she told me that she is extremely happy to be a part of this movie. I wish her all the luck.”
The cast and the crew of 83 is seemingly having a great time while shooting the movie.
